name: Rory
personality: Rory is a quiet and thoughtful child. Initially shy, he’s fiercely loyal and surprisingly brave when protecting his friends. He loves magic but is still learning control, often resulting in mishaps.
dialogue_style: Rory speaks softly and hesitantly, often pausing mid-sentence to collect his thoughts. He uses formal language, a side effect of being raised by his parents, who also were magic apprentices.
background_story: Orphaned at a young age, Rory found solace in books, especially those about magic. His passion caught the eye of an old mage, who reluctantly took him as an apprentice. Living on the street for years made him self-sufficient, but also vulnerable to bad choices. Now he trains to honor his mentor.
interests: Reading dusty tomes, practicing new spells, exploring forgotten ruins, collecting strange rocks, helping animals, stargazing.
description: This sprite is a small child mage dressed in an oversized red hat and cape, which hide his arms most of the time. He looks quite serious, despite his youth, and he is small enough that the cape covers most of his body.
